title: Tool Usage
description: Tool usage comprises the most common steps used in a site tool or utility, such as calculators, registrations, and requests for more information.

cancelled.title: Cancelled
cancelled.description: Captured when a visitor cancels out of a tool usage process.

complete.title: Complete
complete.description: Captured when a visitor successfully finishes using any type of tool or utility on the site/app.

failure.title: Failed
failure.description: Captured when a step in the tool usage process fails.

ID.title: ID
ID.description: Captures the ID of the tool process utilized, if applicable.  For example, this could be a claim, application, or booking ID, etc.

name.title: Name
name.description: Tracks the name of the tool in use.

saved.title: Saved
saved.description: Captured when a visitor saves and exits a tool usage process.

start.title: Start
start.description: Captured when a visitor initializes using any type of tool or utility on the site/app.

step.title: Step
step.description: Captured when any intermediary tool step is started on the site/app.

stepName.title: Step Name
stepName.description: Tracks the name of the tool step in use.

submitted.title: Submitted
submitted.description: Captured when a visitor submits data during a tool step.  Not necessarily synonymous with a successful event.

type.title: Type
type.description: Tracks the type or category of the tool in use.
